pages.text: Hontōni omo o osoreru mono ni wa, anzen'na basho (rakuen) ga aru
Midori no en ya, budō-en
mune no fukureta onaji toshigoro no otome-tachi
mata naminamito afureru hai
Sokode wa tsumaranu hanashi ya itsuwarigoto o kikanai
Korera wa anata no nushi kara no hōshō, tamamono no kessandearu
Ten to ji, soshite sonoaida no subete no mono no shu, jihibukaki okata (kara no tamamonodeari), dare mo kare ni katarikakeru koto wa dekinai
Seirei to tenshi-tachi ga, seiretsu shite tatsu hi, jihibukaki okata kara o yurushi o ete tadashī koto o iu mono igai ni wa, dare mo kuchi o kiku koto ga dekinai
Sore wa shinjitsu no hidearu. Dakara dare demo nozomu mono wa,-nushi no omoto ni modoruga ī

Hontōni ware wa, chōbatsu ga chikai to, anata gata ni keikoku shita. Sonohi, hito wa, jibun no ryōhō no te ga maemotte itta mono (shogyō) o mirudearou. Fushin-sha wa,`ā , nasakenai, watashi ga chirideattanaraba.' To iudearou
Araarashiku (tsumibukaimono no tamashī o) hikihanasu mono ni oite (chikau)
yasashiku (shinkōbukai-sha no tamashī o) hikidasu mono ni oite
oyogu yō ni (jihi no tsukai ni) kassō suru mono ni oite
sakiwoarasotte zenshin suru mono ni oite
(nushi no meirei de) koto o shori suru mono ni oite (chikau)
Sonohi (dai ichi no rappa de), shindō ga (subete no mono o) yurugashi
ji no rappa (de shindō) ga, tsudzuku
(Fushin-sha no) kokoro wa, sonohi ononoki furue
me o fuserudearou
Kare-ra wa iu. `Watashi-tachi wa hajime (seizen) no jōtai ni, hontōni kaeru nodeshou ka
Nani to, watashi-tachi wa kuchihateta hone ni natte shimatta no ni
Kare-ra wa iu. `So no baai (fukkatsu), son'na modoridesu
(Fukkatsu wa), tada hitokoe no sakebidearu
Miyo, kare-ra wa mezamete (chijō ni) arawareru
Mūsā no monogatari ga, anata ni todoita ka
